name: Monalisa Beauty Salon & Academy
address: 47, Amar Singh Marg, Freeganj, Madhav Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text:
I got my hair colored at Monalisa beauty salon and I must say, the work was absolutely amazing! The color turned out exactly how I wanted, and the team made sure every detail was perfect. Their expertise, patience, and dedication truly impressed me.
Not only did I get my hair done here, but I also chose Monalisa beauty salon for all my pre-wedding and wedding looks, and I couldn't have made a better decision. From skincare treatments to bridal makeup and hairstyling, everything was handled with so much professionalism and care.
The staff was incredibly polite and welcoming, making sure I was comfortable at all times.
What stood out the most was how they genuinely cared for me throughout the process.
They constantly checked in to see if I needed anything, whether it was water, a break, or even food when they noticed I hadn't eaten in a while. Their attention to detail and warm hospitality made the entire experience stress-free and enjoyable.

If you're looking for a salon that offers top-notch services with a personal touch, I highly recommend Monalisa beauty salon. They made my big day even more special, and I'm beyond grateful for their efforts. Definitely a 5-star experience!

I went to monalisa 1st time...i felt so relaxed and all staff is very experienced and well trained in all works... They give sufficient time and value to their clients... There is no hurry in any work.. They take their time to finish it... And also staff is very friendly they make you feel very comfortable... I don't know any other staff name but i know seema and pinki they were so well behaved they also answered my queries regarding to skin very patiently... Don't think even once... I would recommend monalisa to everyone... Thank you monalisa for treating me this way!!!!

The experience was very good. They accommodated me as a last minute walk in. Although the lady manager told other people to do my hair wash, blow dry and ironing but those technicians left. There was Kausobsh, who agreed to do my work. She was very kind patient and gentle. She did her work to precision and did not cut corners because of late night. She finished her job with patience and then let me go.
I felt bad because it seemed she was overworked and had her child sick at home but was so dedicated to work that she finished my work even till 10 PM.

Also, dry manicure they did on my nails was worst, cut my skin multiple times and it started bleeding, totally lack of experience and care. Worst experience!!

Highly recommend this place!
